group_1.textLeft: [chara:100101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]What?!
The members of Promised Blood are going to be@at the banquet, too?!

group_1.textRight: So we've been told...
I still can't believe it!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, I'm really surprised...
Shizuka and her friends are too kind...
(I wonder if they're holding this banquet to form@friendships...so we can resolve things peacefully...)

group_1.textRight: Earth to Iroha! Let's talk about the party!

group_1.textLeft: Ah, right, that's why we came here@in the first place...

group_1.textRight: Acts for the banquet...@Does anyone have any ideas...?

group_1.textLeft: I could...demonstrate with a naginata...

group_1.textRight: Oh, that'd work.

group_1.textLeft: Then Akira should do something with karate.

group_1.textRight: Freestyle fighting is...pretty good, but if we want@something flashy, tile-splitting's the way to go.
I bet I can bust through a ton of tiles now that@I'm a Magical Girl.

group_1.textLeft: Carrying the tiles there is going to be@the difficult part.

group_1.textRight: I think Rena...
...would like to do a song and dance by LinkS!

group_1.textLeft: Excuse me?! That's WAY too embarrassing!
I mean...doing it in front of people who aren't fans@would feel weird...

group_1.textRight: Fweh... But Rena, don't you believe in the power of@LinkS' songs...?

group_1.textLeft: Th-that's not the problem!@They're a big hit, even with strangers!

group_1.textRight: Then...

group_1.textLeft: How about YOU do it?!
Emily, how about a traveling version of your@counseling service?

group_1.textRight: I'm totes down for that! I can whip up fixes for@everyone's problems!
All of our members seem like they're having trouble!

group_1.textLeft: Ahaha... We sure are, huh...

group_1.textRight: As for me... Thanks to all of the hard work@I've put in these past few months,
my penmanship has improved tremendously.@I can show that off.

group_1.textLeft: That's not the skill of someone who's been studying@hard, you know...

group_1.textRight: M-my mock exam scores are still going up!

group_1.textLeft: I'm gonna eat super-spicy food as fast as I can!
And it'll double as a Banbanzai advertisement, too.

group_1.textRight: Oh, sweet, an eating contest!
Then I wanna play a beef-guessin' game!

group_1.textLeft: Guessing...the brands of beef and where they@come from?

group_1.textRight: Uh-huh!

group_1.textLeft: Absolutely not. That's far too expensive.

group_1.textRight: Fine, I'll just do it with milk instead...
Huh? You can tell brands of milk apart...?

group_1.textCenter: I'm glad... Everyone has their own special skills@to bring to the party.

group_1.textLeft: Why don't you look around online...?
Maybe you can find something that you could do...

group_1.textRight: Good idea!
Okay, time to search up "party tricks"!
Hm...

group_1.textLeft: Hey, that one's kinda interestin'.

group_1.textRight: Eh? Which one...?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100501:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]This! Puttin' your head in some pantyhose and@playin' tug-of-war with 'em!
Ui. You're absolutely not going to do that, okay?
